replies.msg:
Dear world,

I guess you might find me not the same by the next week,
part of me would be silenced,
part of me would be shot to death,
yet part of me would smile like nothing happened.

Goodbye world,

I guess you won't hear from me by next week,
my tyrannic mother is about to imprison me for disobeying,
my murderous mother is about to impale me for having conscience,
my so-called mother is about to chain me up claiming this is in the name of love.

Dear world
Goodbye world
